mapper.select: SELECT id as refFloorId,build_name,build_type,parent_id,remark,status,build_img,park_id FROM etop_floor WHERE park_id = #{id} AND build_type="floor" GROUP BY build_name,created_at
SELECT id as refStoreyId,build_name,build_type,parent_id,remark,status,build_img,park_id FROM etop_floor WHERE parent_id = #{refFloorId} GROUP BY build_name,created_at
SELECT id as refAreaId,build_name,build_type,parent_id,remark,status,build_img,park_id FROM etop_floor WHERE parent_id = #{refStoreyId} GROUP BY build_name,created_at
SELECT build_img FROM etop_floor WHERE id = #{refStoreyId}
